billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Relates to the compensation of not-for-profit corporation directors, officers, or administrators
summary: Provides that not-for-profit corporations shall not be eligible for funding from the state when the officers, directors, or administrators receive a greater salary than the governor receives.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3076

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A. CALHOUN, BURLING, GALEF, McDONOUGH, SALADINO,
         CASTRO -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A. KOLB, MONTESANO -- read  once
         and referred to the Committee on Corporations, Authorities and Commis-
         sions

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  not-for-profit  corporation law, in relation to
         compensation of not-for-profit  corporation  directors,  officers,  or
         administrators

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The not-for-profit corporation law is amended by  adding  a
    2  new section 727 to read as follows:
    3  S 727. COMPENSATION OF DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, OR ADMINISTRATORS.
    4    A NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATION SHALL NOT RECEIVE FUNDING FROM ANY SOURCE
    5  FROM NEW YORK STATE WHEN ANY DIRECTOR, OFFICER, OR ADMINISTRATOR OF SUCH
    6  NOT-FOR-PROFIT  CORPORATION  RECEIVES A GREATER SALARY THAN THE GOVERNOR
    7  RECEIVES.
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02866-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law, in relation to compensation of not-for-profit corporation directors, officers, or administrators
